creator: thomas.salditt@onprosa.de
text:
my system is a debian lenny with syscp.

Apache/2.2.9 (Debian) PHP/5.2.6-1+lenny3 with Suhosin-Patch mod_ssl/2.2.9 OpenSSL/0.9.8g mod_perl/2.0.4 Perl/v5.10.0

after I update apache2 with the latest patches for debian the problem apears
(apt-get update + apt-get upgrade)

if i call the domain www.dummy.org the apache fall back to the default site.
if i call the domain dummy.org the right site will be send back

Now it looks like that only one domaine is affected all other domains and subdomains on the server work fine 

changing in the config: servername and serveralias as no effect

the konfiguration of the vhosts will not be changed in the last time

Configuration assistance belongs on the users list:

http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html

Be sure to include your vhost configuration, apache2ctl -S, and other basic information if you start a thread there.
creator: covener@gmail.com

text:
10_syscp_ipandport_xx.xx.xx.xx.80.conf:
NameVirtualHost xx.xx.xx.xx:80
<VirtualHost xx.xx.xx.xx:80>
</VirtualHost>

19_syscp_normal_vhost_dummy.org.conf:
<VirtualHost xx.xx.xx.xx:80>
  ServerName www.dummy.org
  ServerAlias dummy.org

  DocumentRoot "/var/syscp/webs/edummy/"
  SuexecUserGroup "edummy" "edummy"
  <Directory "/var/syscp/webs/edummy/">
    AddHandler fcgid-script .php .php3 .php4 .php5
    FCGIWrapper /var/syscp/fcgi/edummy/dummy.org/php-fcgi-starter .php
    FCGIWrapper /var/syscp/fcgi/edummy/dummy.org/php-fcgi-starter .php3
    FCGIWrapper /var/syscp/fcgi/edummy/dummy.org/php-fcgi-starter .php4
    FCGIWrapper /var/syscp/fcgi/edummy/dummy.org/php-fcgi-starter .php5
    Options +ExecCGI
  </Directory>
  ErrorLog "/var/syscp/logs/edummy-error.log"
  CustomLog "/var/syscp/logs/edummy-access.log" combined
</VirtualHost>


apache2ctl -S:
xx.xx.xx.xx:80       is a NameVirtualHost
         default server www.dummy.org (/etc/apache2/sites-enabled/10_syscp_ipandport_xx.xx.xx.xx.80.conf:6)
         port 80 namevhost www.dummy.org (/etc/apache2/sites-enabled/10_syscp_ipandport_xx.xx.xx.xx.80.conf:6)
         port 80 namevhost www.dummy.org (/etc/apache2/sites-enabled/19_syscp_normal_vhost_dummy.org.conf:6)


and for this domain is ssl configurated but here is the same beaviour www.dummy.org not and dummy.org ok
creator: thomas.salditt@onprosa.de
